name: Crash Bandicoot - Back In Time
description:
In an effort to gain a better understanding on how to create 3D platformer controllers in Unity, we set out on a month long adventure to produce this love letter to Crash Bandicoot!


Ncludes:

  • 5 Traditional Levels
  • 5 Flashback Tape Levels
  • The Trials of Uka-Uka
  • Crash Creator (Mario Maker for Crash Bandicoot)
